faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: All important answers about our services

0.question: How quickly will I see first results?
0.answer: First improvements in Google visibility are usually measurable within 7-14 days. The full effect unfolds after 4-6 weeks of continuous optimization.

1.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
1.answer: No, absolutely not. We handle all technical implementation for you. You can focus completely on your restaurant.

2.question: What happens to my existing Google entries?
2.answer: We work with your existing profiles and optimize them. Existing reviews and information are naturally preserved.

3.question: Can I cancel the service at any time?
3.answer: Yes, our services can be canceled with 30 days notice to the end of the month. Some packages have a minimum term of 6 months.

4.question: How does the collaboration work?
4.answer: You get a personal contact person who guides you through the entire process. All changes are coordinated with you before going live.

5.question: What does an individual consultation cost?
5.answer: The initial consultation is completely free for you. We analyze your current situation and show you improvement possibilities without obligation.

6.question: Do you also work with small restaurants?
6.answer: Absolutely! Our services are specifically designed for small and medium-sized restaurants. Whether café, bistro or family restaurant - we have the right package.

7.question: How is success measured?
7.answer: You receive monthly reports with all important metrics: visibility, clicks, calls and reservation requests. This way you can see in black and white how your investment pays off.

datenschutz.intro: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously and treat your personal data confidentially in accordance with legal data protection regulations.
